description._content: Get information on a group topic reply.

error._content: The API key passed was not valid or has expired.

argument.name: api_key
argument._content: Your API application key. See here for more details.

argument.name: group_id
argument._content: Pass in the group id to where the topic belongs. Can be NSID or group alias. Making this parameter optional for legacy reasons, but it is highly recommended to pass this in to get faster performance.

argument.name: topic_id
argument._content: The ID of the topic the post is in.

argument.name: reply_id
argument._content: The ID of the reply to fetch.
